transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Ya hello sir very good morning aap kaun baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Main Vinod Gouri baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Aap Sikandar baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Sikandar ka bhai.
Executive: Accha accha. Ek second sir aap call par hi rahiye theek hai main ek second ruk jaaiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Main aapka profile open kar leti hun one second.
Customer: Kahan se bol rahe ho?
Executive: Main Kajal baat kar rahi hun sir IndiaMART se call kar rahi thi actually main aapke baare aap Gouri Art Udyog se baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan Genuine Handicraft.
Executive: Gouri Art band kar diya humne Genuine Handicraft se bol raha hun.
Executive: Accha to sir bataiye kuch kaam tha sir aapko?
Customer: Mere ko to wo to maine phone kiya tha wo ek photo dala tha abhi tha maine.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Ek dore aata hai dore aata hai ek tarike us tarike karke ujala tangus.
Customer: Wo photo dala tha maine uske mamle mein baat kar rahe ho kya aap?
Executive: Aapne sir photo dala hua hai kahan pe dala hua hai?
Customer: IndiaMART WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Ek koi item chahiye tha mere ko maine haan ji?
Executive: IndiaMART pe aapne photo dala hua hai.
Customer: Haan ek koi item chahiye tha mere ko pallu dore ka item hota hai dora hota hai dore ki gattiya hoti hai uske andar.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Ek second sir main aapko ji ek second main aapka profile open karke ek bari aapko call back karti hun theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs information about a photo he uploaded.



Resolution:

- Executive will check the profile and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- photo, profile, callback, item
